data: I'm a Computer Science undergraduate at University of Kelaniya, specializing in Artificial Intelligence. I’m passionate about AI, Machine Learning, and Web Development, and I love building applications that solve real-world problems.
data.-about-me#📖 About Me: I'm an enthusiastic AI student with a keen interest in Computer Vision, Deep Learning and NLP. I enjoy learning new technologies, working on innovative projects, and collaborating with like-minded individuals. My goal is to contribute to the AI community by developing impactful solutions.
data.web-development#Web Development::
HTML, CSS, JavaScript
React.js, Node.js, Express.js
MERN Stack, MEAN Stack
data.ai--data-science#AI & Data Science::
Machine Learning (TensorFlow, Scikit-learn)
Computer Vision (OpenCV)
NLP (SpaCy, NLTK)
Databases: SQL, MongoDB
data.-education#🎓 Education:
BSc (Hons) in Computer Science (Specializing in Artificial Intelligence)
University of Kelaniya (2022 - Present)
📜 Certifications:
Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals: Computer Vision
Microsoft Azure : Fundamentals of Machine Learning
Introduction to Front-End Development : Coursera
data.-projects#🚀 Projects:
Here are some of my key projects:
AI-Based Water Management System – Developed an AI-driven water usage prediction system using ARIMA and Flask.
Simpson Character Classifier – Developed a web app using Azure Custom Vision for classifying Simpson characters, with a React frontend and Flask backend.
data.-current-interests#🌱 Current Interests:
Exploring advancements in Deep Learning
Advancing my knowledge open-source AI projects

data: Hi, I'm Dilshana Ranawake! I'm a Computer Science student at the University of Kelaniya with a focus on AI, Software Engineering, and Open-Source Contributions. I’m passionate about solving real-world problems through technology and continuously learning to enhance my skills.
data.-my-journey#🚀 My Journey:
My tech journey began with curiosity, and over the years, I’ve become passionate about various areas such as:
Software Development
Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
Cloud Computing & DevOps
Open-Source Contributions
Throughout my academic journey, I’ve worked on exciting projects and collaborated on research that have shaped my skills and knowledge in these areas.

👋😊 Hi, I'm Piyumi Weerarathna!
I’m a Computer Science student at the University of Kelaniya specializing in Data Science, driven by a curiosity to transform raw data into actionable solutions. I thrive on building models, uncovering hidden trends, and telling stories through data to solve complex problems.

Developed a content-based recommendation engine using cosine similarity and Scikit-learn to suggest movies,
achieving 95% relevance in user feedback.

data.-hello-there#👋 Hello There!: I'm Tharusha, a Computer Science student at the University of Kelaniya with a strong passion for Data Science, Data Analysis, and Full-Stack Web Development. I love transforming raw data into meaningful insights and crafting web applications that drive impact.
data.-how-it-all-started#🏁 How It All Started:
My fascination with technology began with a curiosity for how data can tell compelling stories and how web applications can enhance user experiences. Since then, I have expanded my expertise across various domains, including:
📊 Data Science & Analytics
🌐 MERN Stack Development (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js)
🤖 Machine Learning & AI
I've had the opportunity to work on exciting projects that merge data science with software engineering, enabling me to bridge the gap between analytics and application development.

Exploring cloud computing & DevOps
Contributing to open-source and collaborating on exciting projects

data: "With a commitment to security and innovation, I strive to develop technological solutions that empower communities and shape a better future.!"

Welcome to the UOK CS 5th Batch website! We are a dynamic group of students studying Computer Science at the University of Kelaniya. Our batch represents the future of technology, innovation, and creativity in the field of Computer Science.
data.-our-journey-so-far#🌱 Our Journey So Far:
We started our journey together in 2022 with the goal of exploring the endless possibilities within the tech world. From coding challenges to building innovative projects, our batch has achieved significant milestones.
Number of Students: Over 60+ students
Major Areas of Focus:
Software Development
Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
Cybersecurity
Data Science
Web & Mobile Application Development
Collaborations: Internships, Hackathons, Research Projects, Open-Source Contributions
data.-our-vision#🚀 Our Vision:
As a batch, we aim to:
Become proficient in cutting-edge technologies
Engage in real-world problem solving through projects and research
Build strong relationships within the tech community locally and globally
Contribute to the open-source ecosystem
Prepare ourselves for the next-generation challenges in tech
data.-our-achievements#🏆 Our Achievements:
Some of the exciting things we've accomplished so far:
Participated in several National and International Hackathons
Contributed to multiple open-source projects
Developed innovative software solutions for real-world problems
Launched various technical workshops for knowledge-sharing
data.-faculty--mentors#🎓 Faculty & Mentors: Our success is fueled by the dedication and guidance of our Faculty Members and Mentors. They support us in every step of the way, ensuring we stay ahead in the ever-evolving tech world.
data.-meet-our-team#👥 Meet Our Team:
We are diverse and united in our goal of excellence. Our batch consists of students with unique skills and experiences. Whether it's coding, research, or entrepreneurship, we bring our strengths together to create something extraordinary.📚 Keep Exploring, Keep Innovating!
Feel free to browse our profiles, projects, and events. Join us in shaping the future of technology!

Welcome to Daily Components ! This is open source React/Next.js Tailwind UI
components and templates to bootstrap your new apps, projects or landing
sites.

Welcome to Daily Components ! This is open source React/Next.js Tailwind UI
components and templates to bootstrap your new apps, projects or landing
sites.
We are the 5th batch of Computer Science students at the University of Kelaniya. This website serves as a central hub for our batch, showcasing our profiles, projects, and achievements.
data.-our-mission#🎯 Our Mission:
Connect students and alumni
Showcase batch projects and research
Collaborate on open-source initiatives
Grow as a tech-driven community
data.-who-we-are#👥 Who We Are:
We are a group of passionate computer science enthusiasts, exploring fields like:
✅ Software Development
✅ Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
✅ Cybersecurity
✅ Data Science
✅ Web & Mobile App Development
data.-get-involved#🔥 Get Involved:
Want to contribute? You can:
📝 Add your profile to this site
🛠️ Contribute to open-source projects
🚀 Join our discussions & hackathons
📌 Stay connected & keep innovating! 🚀
